price: (Allah azabwira abo bamalayika bombi ati) “Nimujugunye mu muriro wa Jahanamu buri muhakanyi wigometse”,
arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ʿanīdin
